# Welcome {-}

Welcome to the 'Data Science Handbook' project. This is the very first version of a collection of notes aimed to capture the basics of the methods and techniques in the areas of Predictive Analytics and Data Science. We focus on the domains of Finance and Econometrics and employ *R* as programming language to code our sample scripts.
